lexUnit.name: merge.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: combine or be combined to form one.

sentence.text: He was a fiery character of immense stubbornness who stood out against the new plans to merge his land into a co-operative pool that would benefit everyone .

The old Metal Box company merged its can-making business with Carnaud in 1989 .
In 1971 Lord Rothermere merged the tabloid Daily Sketch with his Daily Mail .

They were able to merge their thoughts .
